textBeforeTable: Common monsters found in just about any dungeon. Basic Monsters See Traits for a full list of traits and what they do. Also see the list of bosses. List of Monsters Or, in graphic form: 18 2 9th 24 3 8th 21 3 7th 18 3 6th 20 4 5th 16 4 4th 12 4 3rd 10 5 2nd 10 10 1st Total XP Number Level Distribution Not counting bosses and special uniques, each dungeon contains 38 monsters, with the following level distribution What kind of dungeon you are in also affects monster stats. Monsters in easy dungeons have 90% of way they would normally have, monsters in Normal dungeons have their normal stats, monsters in hard dungeons have 120% of what they would normally have, and monsters in vicious
